author: Lauren Feiner
title: Meg Whitman says Quibi reached 1.7 million downloads in first week
description: The mobile streaming service launched in the middle of the Covid-19 pandemic while many consumers have access to TV-based subscriptions.
content:
New mobile streaming service Quibi saw 1.7 million downloads in its first week, CEO Meg Whitman said on CNBC's "Squawk on the Street" Monday.
The service launched in the middle of the Covid-19 pandemic last Monday, calling into question whether consumers wou… [+2015 chars]
